newest.message:
# Release v4.0.13
## Bug Fixes - Ship Mastery tab retains old selection on skill plan changes
## Contributors - Peter Han

release.message:
# Release v4.0.14
## Bug Fixes - Reaction jobs with undocumented ESI change are now shown properly in the UI - Skills for blank character creator updated - Alpha clone status now affects display fields such as maximum market orders
## Contributors - Peter Han - OperatorOverload
